# MQTT Broadcast for Laravel - Wiki

Welcome to the **MQTT Broadcast** wiki! This documentation provides comprehensive guides for using MQTT in your Laravel applications.

- **[Installation](Installation)** - Install and configure MQTT Broadcast

- **[Multiple Brokers](Multiple-Brokers)** - Configure redundancy
